info.description: Poisson distribution and spawn constraint parameters for passenger generation

passengers_per_building_per_hour.description: Base passenger generation rate per building per hour (spatial factor)

spawn_radius_meters.description: Search radius around route for identifying buildings/landuse zones

min_trip_distance_meters.description: Minimum trip distance for generated passengers

trip_distance_mean_meters.description: Mean of normal distribution for trip distances

trip_distance_std_meters.description: Standard deviation of normal distribution for trip distances

max_trip_distance_ratio.description: Maximum trip distance as ratio of remaining route (0.95 = up to 95% of remaining)

min_spawn_interval_seconds.description: Minimum time between consecutive spawn events
